A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ was a slow and overall boring movie that was missing that Star Wars luster. It was obvious Rian Johnson has more in common with George Lucas than we all thought with his love of CGI and unnecessary comedy. What hurt this movie most was the blatant disregard for the plots and story lines set up by the previous movie. Hopefully JJ Abrams can come back and redeem the franchise and come full circle with the next film.
